ingredients: ½ cup shredded taco-seasoned chicken, already prepared and cooled
1 heaping tbsp cream cheese (whipped is best)
1 tsp jalapenos (to taste, can be more or less)
Optional additions - avocado, green onions, fresh cilantro, crumbled bacon, pico de gallo or salsa
